text: Henriette Ragon (10 June 1918 - 30 April 2015), better known by her stage name Patachou, was a French actress and singer. She appeared on stage, television and movies between 1953 and 2006. She also wrote at least twenty songs. On 1 January 2009, she was awarded the Legion of Honour. Patachou was born in Paris. Her son, Pierre Billon (born 1946), is a songwriter. Patachou died on 30 April 2015 in Paris, aged 96. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1918 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Actors from Paris Category:French movie actors Category:French stage actors Category:French television actors Category:Recipients of the Order of the Legion of Honour Category:Singers from Paris
title: Patachou
